==Translingual==

===Etymology===
Japanese {{Han simp|鬪|f=鬥|t=門}}, itself a simplified variant of [[鬭]], ultimately {{liushu|psc}}, with semantic {{m|mul|鬥||fight|sc=Hant}} (unrelated to [[門]]).

Phonetic is originally [[斲]] but this is graphically simplified to {{Han compound|豆|寸}}; compare [[尌]], which is similar.
